title: Game Crashes.  "The game has crashed. please try to reconnect to the game."
body:
wtf of that i was just play normally with 80 ms and 74 fps ! 
then got this fcker bug and down prio in queue for 20 min ! omg 
now what to do and why punish ?!

replies.body:
You'll never get a low-priority queue for disconnecting from a single match. It takes a trend of disconnections before you'll see the 20-minute LPQ. Game crashes with this message are usually caused by driver or hardware issues, so I recommend working through the steps outlined in our [Crashing Guide.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes)

Let me know if those steps caused any noticeable changes.
